discourse_list.title: The Endgame Plan call Thursday 5pm CEST: everyone welcome

content.content: image2556×1300 187 KB  Hey everyone Like I mentioned on the Voter Committee call yesterday, and as I have been discussing for some time on discord, I am doing a public presentation of the Endgame Plan tomorrow at 5pm CEST. The Endgame Plan is a long term vision and roadmap with a fully defined, immutable steady state as its end goal. It is also comprehensive governance overhaul that is aimed to narrowing the focus of Maker’s core governance and simplifying it to the point where MKR holders can realistically keep up, while at the same time tapping into the incredible value that’s been produced in the Core Units and the high quality talent that exists in the workforce, but that is right now being held back by the complexity and suboptimal structure. The plan is based around the concept of “MetaDAOs”, which are an evolution of the concept of “SubDAOs” or “DAO Pods” which are already well established concepts in DAOs and DeFi and the DAO Tools fields. Basically smaller and specialized DAOs that are connected to a main “mothership DAO” (Maker in this case) through shared tokenomics, incentives and/or infrastructure. On the call I will be making the case that MetaDAOs are a groundbreaking and incredibly powerful silver bullet that can be used to solve almost all of the problems we are facing right now, and in many cases allow us to get the best of both worlds in many of the trade offs we are facing. At the same time they are extremely simple, cheap and low risk to create as we already have all of the necessary prerequisites in place, and their instant value potential is significant because we have so much hidden value in the core units that is right now buried in the complexity, but that we can unearth using this simple method. Finally the plan is includes some very significant short term upsides for growth and MKR value accrual, and many other benefits. I’m gonna risk it one more time with a public google link:   meet.google.com   Google Meet (formerly Hangouts Meet) - Free Video Meetings Use Google Meet (formerly Hangouts Meet) video conferencing solutions from your browser or mobile app. Get started with a secure, HD video today.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is announcing a public presentation of the Endgame Plan, which is a comprehensive governance overhaul for Maker's core governance. The plan is based on the concept of "MetaDAOs" and aims to simplify the governance structure while tapping into the value produced in the Core Units. The author will make the case that MetaDAOs are a powerful solution to the problems faced by Maker. The post does not contain entirely positive or negative feedback on the proposal, but it does invite questions and constructive criticism.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
